notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected shelters and other buildings at the Bab Al Salame IDP Camp in A'Zaz District, Syria. As of 05 June 2015, a total of  1,612 shelters were detected as well as 222 infrastructures and support buildings within the 23 hectares of the camp. This is a preliminary analysis & has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
